text: Ke kaloku Yathi iNkosi Yakho Isakuthi kwiingelosi: “Yabonani! Ndiza kwenza ummeli ehlabathini”, zathi zona: “Uza kwenza apho umntu oza kuthi enze ubutshinga, aphalaze negazi lo gama thina siya kuba siKuzukisa ngeendumiso zaKho, siKungcwalisa nokuKungcwalisa?” Wathi Yena, “Inene Mna Ndazi eningakwaziyo nina.”
